name: Speed Car Fighter HD 2015 Free
description:
Speed Car Fighter 3D 2015 HD is amazing 3D Car Racing Game for Everyone. You will love to play this amazing game. Excitement increases after every level. Get Ready to Rock with this amazing Game for everyone.

Features
-HD Quality of Graphics used in the Game.
-Game is in 3D.
-There are 4 Levels in the Full Version without any ads.
-Excitement increases after every level.
-Game is Fully optimized & tested for iPhone 4,4s,5,5s,6,6 Plus & iPad (All).
-20 Different Cars available through in-app purchase.
-Ratings & Feedback Appreciated.

Note: Upgrade to Full version to Unlock all the Levels with amazing features.
